com.st.st25sdk.type5.st25tv

Class ST25TVTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
      • com.st.st25sdk.type5.Type5Tag
        • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STType5Tag
          • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STType5MultiAreaTag
            • com.st.st25sdk.type5.st25tv.ST25TVTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface, CCFileInterface, Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface, NdefCommandInterface, MultiAreaInterface, RegisterInterface, SignatureInterface, SysFileInterface, STType5PasswordInterface, UntraceableModeInterface

    public class ST25TVTag
extends STType5MultiAreaTag
implements MultiAreaInterface, STType5PasswordInterface, Iso15693CustomKillCommandInterface, UntraceableModeInterface, SignatureInterface, RegisterInterface
    Defines methods to handle a ST25TV Tag

      void enableUntraceableMode(byte[] password)

      This command is used to kill the tag (does not answer any RF commands) WARNING: This action is irreversible, it will not be possible to recover the tag

    • Constructor Detail

      • ST25TVTag

        public ST25TVTag(RFReaderInterface readerInterface,
                 byte[] uid)
          throws STException
        Constructor for a ST25TVTag object. No check will be performed on EAS. Extra commands will be sent to get the memory size and the area configuration.
        Parameters:
        readerInterface - a reader interface object to be used to access this tag
        uid - Unique ID of this tag
        Throws:
        STException

      • ST25TVTag

        public ST25TVTag(RFReaderInterface readerInterface,
                 byte[] uid,
                 boolean checkEasStatus)
          throws STException
        Constructor for a ST25TVTag object. Extra commands will be sent to get the memory size and the area configuration.
        Parameters:
        readerInterface - a reader interface object to be used to access this tag
        uid - Unique ID of this tag
        checkEasStatus - Indicates if EAS Alarm status should be checked during tag initialization.
        Throws:
        STException

      • ST25TVTag

        public ST25TVTag(RFReaderInterface readerInterface,
                 byte[] uid,
                 boolean checkEasStatus,
                 boolean sendInitCommands)
          throws STException
        Constructor for a ST25TVTag object
        Parameters:
        readerInterface - a reader interface object to be used to access this tag
        uid - Unique ID of this tag
        checkEasStatus - Indicates if EAS Alarm status should be checked during tag initialization.
        sendInitCommands - boolean that indicates if you want to interrogate the tag to get extra information (get memory size and area configuration)
        Throws:
        STException

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • enableEas

        public byte[] enableEas(byte easIdMask,
                        byte[] easId,
                        byte flag)
                 throws STException
        Sends the enable EAS command to read the EAS telegram or to get the EAS ID
        Parameters:
        easIdMask - Mask value for easId parameter (0=no easId, 8=8-bit easId, 16=16-bit easId) If easIdMask = 0, enableEAS will return the tag's 16-bit EAS ID
        easId - null or 8-bit EAS ID or 16-bit EAS ID according to easIdMask's value
        flag - Command flag. The Option bit has an impact on the returned value.
        Returns:
        the EAS telegram or the EAS ID as a byte array
        Throws:
        STException

      • writeEasId

                throws STException

          throws STException

      • getKeyIdNDA

        public byte getKeyIdNDA()
                 throws STException
        Indicate the Key Identifier (KID) corresponding to this tag. This KeyId allows to choose the appropriate Certificate for Signature verification.
        Specified by:
        getKeyIdNDA in interface SignatureInterface
        Returns:
        1 byte KID value
        Throws:
        STException - IMPLEMENTED_IN_NDA_VERSION is thrown if the SDK doesn't contain Signature verification code. MISSING_LIBRARY is thrown if the BouncyCastle Libraries are not linked with the application.

      • isSignatureOkNDA

        public boolean isSignatureOkNDA()
                         throws STException
        Function verifying the signature present in this tag
        Specified by:
        isSignatureOkNDA in interface SignatureInterface
        Returns:
        True if signature is OK.
        Throws:
        STException - IMPLEMENTED_IN_NDA_VERSION is thrown if the SDK doesn't contain Signature verification code. MISSING_LIBRARY is thrown if the BouncyCastle Libraries are not linked with the application.

      • readSignatureNDA

        public byte[] readSignatureNDA()
                        throws STException

        Specified by:
        readSignatureNDA in interface SignatureInterface
        Returns:
        32-bit Electronic Signature data
        Throws:
        STException - IMPLEMENTED_IN_NDA_VERSION is thrown if the SDK doesn't contain Signature verification code. MISSING_LIBRARY is thrown if the BouncyCastle Libraries are not linked with the application.
